readable.title: 2656749876_e32495bd8c
readable.content: A man talks on his cellphone while he walks down the street . A member of the clergy carries a blue bag in his hand and talks on the phone as he walks . A priest carrying a small blue bag walking down the street talking on a cellphone . Priest in black walking on sidewalk carrying a blue bag and talking on cellphone . Priest walking with blue bag while talking on cellphone .
